ActFinancial Administration Act
Borrowing Authority Act, 1996-97
PrecisAuthority to specify $370 billion as the aggregate principal amount of money that the Minister may borrow in the period beginning April 1, 2009 and ending on March 31, 2010 through the issue of bonds, notes and treasury bills.
